No Authority to Review Rating Decisions Prior to Issuance of a Decision Notice
Accredited representatives (VSOs, attorneys, and claim agents) have no authority – and will not be permitted – to review rating decisions before VA issues a decision notice.
Reference
:  For more information on historical criteria applicable to VSO review of rating decisions prior to promulgation and issuance of a decision notice, see the attachment to
historical M21-1, Part I, 1.B
,
